title: Killing Lizardman Shamans (Canyon)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The profit rate assumes 180 kills per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed and luck.

Killing Lizardman Shaman in the Lizardman Canyon

  • 70+ recommended

    Results
    ProfitExperience gained
    1,747,901
    Inputs (825,749)Outputs (2,573,650)
    3 × Divine ranging potion(4) (11,427)12 × Prayer potion(4) (120,792)3 × Sea turtle (3,117)1.25 × Antidote++(4) (2,213)3,000 × Zulrah's scales (474,000)600 × Adamant dart (19,200)1,000 × Cannonball (195,000)6.48 × Rune med helm (71,772)6.12 × Earth battlestaff (54,339)6.12 × Mystic earth staff (153,649)5.76 × Rune warhammer (147,041)4.32 × Rune chainbody (127,604)3.6 × Red d'hide vambraces (6,296)630 × Air rune (3,150)450 × Chaos rune (28,800)225 × Death rune (41,850)630 × Fire rune (3,150)162 × Coal (27,702)234 × Iron ore (14,976)11.52 × Runite ore (127,400)12.65 × Grimy kwuarm (22,196)10.13 × Grimy cadantine (19,351)10.13 × Grimy dwarf weed (11,068)3.04 × Grimy lantadyme (4,860)0.43 × Ranarr seed (18,802)0.4 × Snapdragon seed (36,172)0.4 × Torstol seed (24,345)0.29 × Watermelon seed (3.46)0.26 × Mahogany seed (416)0.26 × Maple seed (4,609)180 × Teak seed (9,360)0.26 × Yew seed (13,911)0.22 × Papaya tree seed (791)0.17 × Magic seed (23,397)0.14 × Palm tree seed (5,166)0.086 × Dragonfruit tree seed (17,448)0.058 × Celastrus seed (5,455)0.058 × Redwood tree seed (2,975)76,858 × Coins (76,858)164 × Lizardman fang (3,283)0.036 × Dragon warhammer (1,465,454)

    The profit rate assumes 180 kills per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed and luck.

    Lizardman Shamans are Lizardmans that possess the ability to use a few special attacks. They are relatively quick to kill, have decent drops overall, and also the Dragon warhammer as a rare drop. Kills range between 25-30 seconds in the Lizardman Temple, Settlement, and Caves when on Slayer task. This puts the range at around 100-130 kills. The average Lizardman shaman kill is worth 14,943.. Note that you may need to input more food in the Lizardmen Settlemen-therefore it is reccomended to primarily kill Lizardmen in the Temple or Caves. Excluding the dragon warhammer, the average kill is worth 6,803 Because of the rarity of the Dragon Warhammer, the full rate of Lizardman Shamans is inconsistent similar to Demonic Gorillas albeit to a much greater extent. On average, without the Dragon warhammer players will make around half as much gold per hour as they would with the drop. At 180 kills per hour one would need to kill Lizardman Shamans for aproximately 27.77 hours to achieve the average profit per hour listed here.


    Strategies

    See the Lizardman Shaman article and the Lizardman shaman/Strategies for additional information.

    Due to constantly changing prices on the Grand Exchange, some information in this article may or may not be current.
    It is strongly recommended to check the live prices on the Grand Exchange before making large investments in any method.
    All prices on this page are cached, meaning it is possible that they appear out of date.
    To force a new cache of this page, click this link.
    If a money making method is out of date, you can edit it or leave a message on the talk page.
